author: Amy Cheng, Dan Lamothe, Andrew Jeong, David L. Stern
title: Russia-Ukraine live updates: Rockets strike Kyiv amid invasion, Ukraine says; U.S. fears capital could soon fall
description: Biden administration officials told lawmakers late Thursday that they feared the capital would soon fall, with Russian mechanized forces that had crossed over from Belarus on its outskirts.
content: Senior U.S. government officials believe Ukraines capital could fall quickly to advancing Russian forces, according to details of a phone call they had with congressional lawmakers Thursday evening.â€¦ [+928 chars]
